name: Viking's drakkars
description: Feel yourself a Viking, play alone, developing attention, or with a friend on one computer.
minimum_requirements: OS: xp, Vista, 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel atom 1.2 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: windows 7 8 8.1 10 Processor: Intel I3 or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Better then Intel HD Graphics Storage: 500 GB available space Sound Card: Any
